request.description:
Job Name: API job created based on HDF. with header filled

Using this request one can create a new job with 
Fields that will be under Test in next steps: 
•	Sales Order
•	Ship To #
•	Well Name
•	Well Number
•	API/UWI
•	Rig Name

In the response from server user will receive a job id of the newly created job. Save this job id if you need to update it in future.
Response is saved to {{jobId}} environment variable

(Job Code sample: 0375bde6-64ff-48ef-868d-8e34b2d48bd2)

request.description:
Returns Job Header Info for a selected job in the response

Inspect response from Server and verify that following fields are present and data is correct:
Job Header fields: 
    Sales Order
    Ship To #
    Well Name
    Well Number
    API/UWI
    Rig Name 
    Rig Description from Rig Master list 
    Hole Size, Hole Size Excess, and Casing Size values, as many as are populated (max of 3)

Pump Schedule related fields:
    Total Job Weight (In API units); 
    Total Job Volume  

CP#2 related data:
    Other Considerations to Note from CP 2
    Internal Notes from CP 2 (new)
    Technical Values, to include the following :
    MD Customer Value from CP 2
    TVD Customer Value from CP 2
    Mud Weight Customer Value from CP 2
